oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Cotton Crop Guide - A manual for practitioners in the tropics
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Eyhorn, Frank
Ratter, Saro G.
Ramakrishnan, Mahesh
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
Production systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Designed primarily as a reference manual for extension workers and farmers, the Organic Cotton Crop Guide provides comprehensive practical know-how on organic cotton production in the tropics. The guide covers all relevant aspects from soil preparation and variety selection over crop nutrition and pest management to the economic performance of organic cotton farming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Research Institute of Organic Agriculture (FibL), Frick, Switzerland
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Eyhorn, Frank; Ratter, Saro G. and Ramakrishnan, Mahesh (2005) Organic Cotton Crop Guide - A manual for practitioners in the tropics. Research Institute of Organic Agriculture (FibL), Frick, Switzerland.
